title: Patterns Up, Patterns Down, and ConverZations All Around
description:
This little corner of the internet has been popping with great discussions. I take a look at several to find some threads of connection, especially to the question of a personal God and implications for human relationships at various scales. Here is a list of videos I reference roughly in order of mention:
Christian Iconography Shows Us the Pattern of Reality | St-Tikhon's Seminary Talk https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CD3E7ZjgxqQ
Emergence and levels of Being - With JP Marceau https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TX78CipFi-A
Discussing René Girard and others with Craig Stewart https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1pZ1nUP7gq8
"The Thou structure of the World" Christopher Mastropietro & Guy Sengstock in Dia Logos https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hPorhHCj-Do
Response to comments from "Thou structure of the world" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9rWzcq0YfpY
Marriage as the Union of Man and Woman (Maria Fedoryka) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mueKYIKIBys
Sovereignty & Autonomy, Rafia Morgan (Collective Intelligence Series) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=23ep513pD94
Love as the ground of teaching Part 2 with Leo Ferraro & Guy Sengstock https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7nmAZ4jpwj8
Father seeks the Consolation of Faith in a World of Peril for his Children https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_WqdrvNb8lI
PVK to John Vervaeke "God is Ancient the Solution to the Frame Problem" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BqinRbjqy2c
Pattern Understanding https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RIaxI_-0IOA
Dynamic Patterns in Water as Analogue Models https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vTerUb7SSyQ
